labels.name: status:needs-more-info
labels.description: There's not enough information to start working on this issue

body: Hi @GopherJ! The `hardhat-verify` plugin does not use `axios`. Can you give us more information or a minimal repo where we can validate the error?
Closing for now as it doesn't seem related to hardhat since we don't use axios. Happy to reopen if a reproduction repo is provided.
